Html:
Just starting out on MVVM design, and I would like to know how is the MVVM Light Toolkit support on SharpDevelop? At first I guess the templates woudn't work, but besides that everything else should be fine.

Anyone has tried it? How hard would it be to convert the templates to SharpDevelop?

Hi,

I am not super familiar with #develop. The project templates, item templates and code snippets in MVVM Light are targeted at Visual Studio, so there is a possibility that they do not work on #develop (except of course if the team decided to support the same formats, which would be a clever thing to do I guess). The components in the DLLs will work just fine, since eventually this is all .NET.

Cheers,

Laurent
